column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Only came here for drinks but it was a lovely experience. The atmosphere was dark and swanky and intimate with candlelit tables and large chandeliers. There was a nostalgic feel to everything with the music and vintage posters on the wall. The place was pretty much full with most tables occupied and a crowded bar. We ended up sitting at the couches up front with our drinks. It was clearly a place to come for a special occasion or nice night of wining and dining. We were promptly served our drinks
column2: which were well crafted. Next time
column3: I'll have to return to give some of those oysters a go!
